alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 1:14AM PST until February 15 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow showers in the area could result in brief periods of blowing snow, reducing visibility on roadways. Use caution when driving.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
